# Book.Create method

Creates and opens a book.

```csharp
public static Book Create(GnuCashUri uri, bool overwrite = false)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| uri | URI to the book. |
| overwrite | true to overwrite the existing book. |

## Exceptions

| exception | condition |
| --- | --- |
| GnuCashBackendException | Throws when an error occured while opening the book. |
